extendedInfo.description: Reject calls when you are busy and inform the caller over SMS and add a reminder to your calendar to remind you to call back.How it works:After you reject/miss a call, a popup will appear with list of configured SMS messages. Choose one of the messages, SMS will be sent to the rejected/missed phone number with the selected message and a reminder will be added to your calendar to remind you to call the same number.If you do not want to send SMS and just want to remind you, click the 'Just Remind Me' Button. Click 'No Thanks' if you do not want send SMS or add Reminder.Open 'Call Reject and Remind' app and click 'Settings' button. You can do following in settings screen- Configure your SMS messages- Enable/Disable SMS messages- Enable/Disable Reminder- Configure remider time- Choose your Calendar (Without this setting reminder will not be added)Known Issue:- You may need to unlock the screen to view the popup

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: Very Simple and Awesome app. Only prob is Im using a Dual sim phone and the message is sent from the current active sim.i dont have the option to switch between 2 sims. But hope that additional feature will be added in a later version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: too buggy - caused more probs than fixed
reviews.comment: The annoyance was that you showed only the number and not the name of the contact.  I could get over that.  The thing that made it worse than nothing was that often I would send the SMS and instead of going to the person who had called me (whose call I was rejecting) it would go to someone else on my recent calls list!  So someone unrelated gets an inexplicable text, the person whose call just got rejected knows nothing except I rejected his call, and I assume everything is golden.  No good. Uninstalled and looking for something else.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Good App
reviews.comment: Need to close the message after certain time, also need to unlock the phone after missed call not only after reject the call
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Make it perfect and mantain. The app :) l\'ll donate 10 uer when perfect, I\'ve been waiting for this.

reviews.title: Best of it\'s kind.
reviews.comment: Simple to use auto-SMS app. If it were an iPhone app people would think it\'s the second coming of Christ. Small (<60kb) and pretty.
reviews.author: Andri Yatim

reviews.title: Very Very  nice app
reviews.comment: I will give 5 stars if it comes on screen even if screen lock is on.... msg screen does not show without open slide lock.... plz fix the issue. very nice app.

reviews.comment: Cracking app! Definitely get it if you need to manage calls whilst in meetings.
